title.bibl: Krasnow Scrapbooks, Vol. II, owned by Dr. H. R. Krasnow, 4601 N. Broadway, Chicago, Ill. Play and Concert for Benefit of Russian People's School of Brighton Park

div.bibl: Krasnow Scrapbooks, Vol. II, owned by Dr. H. R. Krasnow, 4601 N. Broadway, Chicago, Ill. PLAY AND CONCERT FOR BENEFIT OF RUSSIAN PEOPLE'S SCHOOL OF BRIGHTON PARK

body.p: On May 14, 1921, the Russian People's School of Brighton Park gave the play, "Po Tu i Etu Storonu Okeana," followed by an instrumental and vocal concert. It was given at Liberty Hall, 3925 S. Kedzie.
